EmailTemplate.name: ENG-Multi Hypervisor/Hyper-V-Nurture.ENG-Mult-Hypervisor-Early-04.04-30-Day-Tria
EmailTemplate.subject: Be Hypervisor & Vendor Agnostic
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-Mult-Hypv&utm_content=Early04]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, We get it. There are numerous reasons why heterogeneous environments exist: financial cost, legacy systems, data center consolidation. These business realities are easily managed with VMTurbo. Just set up your hypervisor targets in VMTurbo—Microsoft Hyper-V, VMware vCenter, Red Hat RHEV-M, or Citrix XenServer—and let our software do the rest. Are you ready to see all that VMTurbo has to offer you? Give the free trial a shot <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-Mult-Hypv&utm_content=Early04]]> and see just how VMTurbo will drive your environment to perpetual health. <[[http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-Mult-Hypv&utm_content=Early04]]> - The VMTurbo Team
